item.title: Report X-2025021208
item.description:
Report X-2025021208

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-13
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box was discovered with signs of a release at the MEMH during sort operations. It contained four plastic bottles and one of them was damaged on the bottom causing a release. The contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
